descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

articles.headline: Aldama, Grizzlies to host Avdija and the Trail Blazers
articles.description: Portland Trail Blazers (9-14, 10th in the Western Conference) vs. Memphis Grizzlies (10-13, ninth in the Western Conference)

articles.headline: Dallas faces conference foe Houston
articles.description: Houston Rockets (15-5, second in the Western Conference) vs. Dallas Mavericks (8-16, 12th in the Western Conference)

articles.headline: Denver plays Charlotte following Jokic's 40-point game
articles.description: Denver Nuggets (16-6, fourth in the Western Conference) vs. Charlotte Hornets (7-16, 12th in the Eastern Conference)

articles.headline: Atlanta faces Washington, looks to stop 3-game skid
articles.description: Atlanta Hawks (13-11, ninth in the Eastern Conference) vs. Washington Wizards (3-18, 15th in the Eastern Conference)

articles.headline: Thunder take on the Jazz, look for 15th straight victory
articles.description: Oklahoma City Thunder (22-1, first in the Western Conference) vs. Utah Jazz (8-14, 11th in the Western Conference)

articles.headline: Milwaukee visits Detroit on 5-game road slide
articles.description: Milwaukee Bucks (10-14, 10th in the Eastern Conference) vs. Detroit Pistons (18-5, first in the Eastern Conference)
